queries.name: top_10_by_fulltext_rank
queries.query: SELECT TOP 10 c.index, c.title FROM c WHERE FullTextContains(c.title, 'John') OR FullTextContains(c.text, 'John') ORDER BY RANK FullTextScore(c.title, 'John')

queries.name: offset_limit
queries.query: SELECT c.index, c.title FROM c WHERE FullTextContains(c.title, 'John') OR FullTextContains(c.text, 'John') ORDER BY RANK FullTextScore(c.title, 'John') OFFSET 1 LIMIT 5

queries.name: top_20_rrf
queries.query: SELECT TOP 20 c.index, c.title FROM c WHERE FullTextContains(c.title, 'John') OR FullTextContains(c.text, 'John') OR FullTextContains(c.text, 'United States') ORDER BY RANK RRF(FullTextScore(c.title, 'John'), FullTextScore(c.text, 'United States'))

queries.name: top_10_rrf
queries.query: SELECT TOP 10 c.index, c.title FROM c WHERE FullTextContains(c.title, 'John') OR FullTextContains(c.text, 'John') OR FullTextContains(c.text, 'United States') ORDER BY RANK RRF(FullTextScore(c.title, 'John'), FullTextScore(c.text, 'United States'))

queries.name: offset_limit_rrf
queries.query: SELECT c.index, c.title FROM c WHERE FullTextContains(c.title, 'John') OR FullTextContains(c.text, 'John') OR FullTextContains(c.text, 'United States') ORDER BY RANK RRF(FullTextScore(c.title, 'John'), FullTextScore(c.text, 'United States')) OFFSET 5 LIMIT 10

queries.name: order_by_rrf_unfiltered
queries.query: SELECT TOP 10 c.index, c.title FROM c ORDER BY RANK RRF(FullTextScore(c.title, 'John'), FullTextScore(c.text, 'United States'))

queries.name: offset_limit_rrf_unfiltered
queries.query: SELECT c.index, c.title FROM c ORDER BY RANK RRF(FullTextScore(c.title, 'John'), FullTextScore(c.text, 'United States')) OFFSET 0 LIMIT 13

queries.name: offset_limit_rrf_ft_with_vector
queries.query: SELECT c.index, c.title FROM c ORDER BY RANK RRF(FullTextScore(c.text, 'United States'), VectorDistance(c.vector, @testData_searchVector)) OFFSET 0 LIMIT 10
